recipesJson.name: Strawberry Jelly Slice
recipesJson.author: JOE_ROOTS
recipesJson.description:
This is my take on a Australian dessert that I never had in my mouth. I have no idea if this taste closely to the real ‚Äúthingy ‚Äú on the picture, but as a vape it sure I DELICIOUS!

My notes are short, but they are here.

- Sugar cookie: is the bottom of the slice.

- Custards premium + Bavarian cream is the middle layer

- Strawberry ripe + shisha strawberry: strawberry ripe is the ripe strawberry and shisha strawberry and sweet Strawberry is the jelly. 

That‚Äôs it. That is how to make a delicious recipe without the recipe and without going crazy with all sorts of things. Just keeping it simple and use the ingredients that you see on the picture. That‚Äôs it.  

If you enjoy pls comment or something. 

- Joe Roots

reviews.text: I love a jelly slice Joe. It's quite easy to make but takes a little time to set. I will be mixing this up üôèüòä the secret ingredient is a dash of lemon in the middle layer ü§´
